name: Don't Walk Alone (Gameheads)
description:
“Don’t Walk Alone” is a 2D platformer/walking simulator with dialogue-based combat that conveys themes of resilience and empowerment to encourage the player to defeat misogyny & street harassment through wit, sass, and clap backs. Follow Aurora as she puts catcallers in their places!

How To Play 

Objective:  

Get to class, defeat, and defend yourself from catcallers.  

Keys: 

  • A, D- Left and Right 
  • ESC- Start 
  • Left Click -Select 
  • Space- Interact with NPC
